author: jdonnerstag
msg: removed IMarkup.PATH_SEPARATOR and replaced it with Component.PATH_SEPARATOR as both serve the same purpose

author: jdonnerstag
msg: MarkupFragments now support border body-parents. As currently both the new and the old implementations are used
and as the old implementation does not support it, the Component constructor will still fail.

author: jdonnerstag
msg: fixed a bug I introduced in the previous commit
